title: Extrasensory Perception
creator_contributor_role: St Mary's Anglican Girls' College, creator
abstract: Who has the stronger powers? (Winner in the Senior Live Action category).
description: Winner in the Senior Live Action category. Extrasensory Perception is a film which takes audiences on an emotional journey of confusion, suspense and realization. It is a complex narrative featuring an engaging crime and characters bearing supernatural powers…
